product_meta.title: Hoya 55mm Alpha Circular Polarizer Filter
product_meta.description: Size:55mmLight rays which are reflected by any surface can become polarised so polarising filters are used to select which light rays enter your camera lens. CIR-PL filters allow you to remove unwanted reflections from non-metallic surfaces such as water, glass etc. They also enable colors to become more saturated and appear clearer with better contrast. This effect is often used to increase the contrast and saturation in blue skies and white clouds. HOYA's polarising filters do not affect the overall color balance of a shot.
feature_bullets: Great optical quality at an affordable price.
These new HOYA series plus the EVO filters are manufactured by HOYA exclusively for distribution in the United States of America.
